item.description:
Posted as an FYI for those that are interested!

Opening Celebration: America in View: Landscape Photography 1865 to Now’

Chace Center

5:30 PM - 8:30 PM

Join the RISD Museum in celebrating this dramatic exhibition of more than 150 photographs depicting the magnificence of American landscape photography. Enjoy refreshments and a first look at these captivating works. Free, all welcome. Exhibition on view through Sunday, January 13, 2013.

The event is free and open to the public.

http://risdmuseum.org/events.aspx?id=2147522330

Please note that this is a Collective FYI, which is just that - For Your Information. I will probably be attending, but this is not a "hosted" event. If you are interested in attending, please RSVP so people know who to look for if they attend!
item.how_to_find_us: Posted as an FYI only, however, I'll be wearing a bright blue, gradated-dyed scarf!
item.name: P-Collective FYI - Opening Celebration: America in View: Landscape Photography
